text: The End of the World () is a 1992 Portuguese French drama movie directed by João Mário Grilo and starring Adelaide João, Zita Duarte, Santos Manuel, João Lagarto, Carlos Daniel, Alexandra Lencastre, Henrique Viana. ==Other websites== * Category:1992 drama movies Category:Portuguese movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by João Mário Grilo
title: The End of the World (1992 movie)
